website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Z Fury Tempo is a no-nonsense shoe that delivers great service and performance. With good enough arch support, excellent flexibility, and unbelievable comfort, runners can get the most value out of a shoe that is quite inexpensive in the first place.
pros: Many reviewers raved about the shoe’s low profile for maximum mobility
The Z Fury Tempo is very flexible
Comfort is at the top of its list of qualities, as far as most runners are concerned
Many testers consider this as a great beginner’s running shoe
Some call it a hybrid shoe that delivers well on race day and durable enough for daily training
Several runners appreciated its ample cushioning and responsive features
cons: A handful of runners disliked the way the outsole attracts small rocks and other road debris
Others noted that it wasn’t able to provide a robust cushioning system to fully carry the foot responsibly

customer_reviews.title: Rocks get stuck in Groves
customer_reviews.text: This shoe does not wrap around my ankle as well as most New Balance shoes; so I leave the top two holes unlaced to give me the bending freedom I desire. Also, rocks get stuck in the groves of these shoes more than any other shoe I have owned, about 8 per shoe for a 1 mile run on dirt with rocks. Me: I use to run a lot and fast, now at 53 years of age and 136 pounds, I run 2 or 3 times each week 2.2 miles each time, and am 5'10" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Emdee

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, Like the fit.
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I buy Reebok is because they seem to fit and conform better to my foot than other brands of shoes that I've tried. While these are certainly comfortable, they don't fit quite the same as pairs that I've purchased in the past. I would still recommend them, but you might want to see if you can try some on before you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: J in Fate

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are for my son to run cross country in. He loves them and they fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and fitting light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe. It fits well and is very comfortable. Wore for a 5k without any pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't fit right for me as I have very weird feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gravel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but not supportive at all, Feel nice for walking or ocassionally running
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: He really likes them but they are too tight overall for his normal size. He especially likes the style.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Milligan

customer_reviews.title: One notch below ZigTec
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe very well put together keeps you light on your feet
customer_reviews.author: buffcanuck83

customer_reviews.title: Just, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Reaaaaally nice shoes...!! They're confortable, light, good looking... PERFECT!! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Mier y Teran

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: From a price to performance ratio, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: CJReview

customer_reviews.title: I like them, the only bad thing is than is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them, the only bad thing is than is a little uncomfortable for people with wide feet like me... I still use them for the gym and they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Caban

customer_reviews.title: Great color, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers were a gift for my Stepfather. He loves them. Great color, lightweight, and a perfect fit. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey cerato

customer_reviews.title: I put them next to another pair exactly same size ...
customer_reviews.text: I put them next to another pair exactly same size and this pair was off by about a1/4 inch. I'll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Stutz

customer_reviews.title: Wears quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Already showing wear on the Achilles tendon area... Probably because it was too tight there initially.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoes love them never had reebok before but fits great and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn evertts

customer_reviews.title: I did a 5 miles walk/jog and my feet where aching a bit so I don't think these are great for a long run but a 2 mile deal ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really decent for the price. I did a 5 miles walk/jog and my feet where aching a bit so I don't think these are great for a long run but a 2 mile deal is fine. Also, I have worn them to work a few times and they are comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe. Very lightweight. Feels more like a basketball shoe than a running shoe. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Donahue

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Z Fury Tempo-M Z Fury Tempo-m
product_meta.description: Inspired by ZRated tires, this innovative running shoe wraps its sports carworthy handling in an eyecatching, open mesh upper for a pleasing balance of style and speed.
